channel.title: GWD help
channel.description: Good day, I added to my client GWD everything is working but there is one problem. While walking in GWD it just randomly give me "loading please wait" message. [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 70 at client.method24(client.java:1119) at client.loadingStages(client.java:3231) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3774) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2651) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:133) at client.run(client.java:5349) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code] Im trying to fix it about 2 days and only thing i know is the problem is probably in ObjectMaps because when I delete all models then its working but without objects. It's about Refractored client. Im willing pay you for help. MSN: deman@hotmail.sk

item.title: GWD help
item.dc:creator: @moparscapesk moparscapesk
item.description:
@moparscapesk wrote:

Good day,
I added to my client GWD everything is working but there is one problem. While walking in GWD it just randomly give me “loading please wait” message.

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 70 at client.method24(client.java:1119) at client.loadingStages(client.java:3231) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3774) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2651) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:133) at client.run(client.java:5349) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Im trying to fix it about 2 days and only thing i know is the problem is probably in ObjectMaps because when I delete all models then its working but without objects.
It’s about Refractored client.
Im willing pay you for help.
MSN: deman@hotmail.sk

Read full topic
